sentence.Network_en: I tried to reach the foot brakes but I couldn't.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试图去够脚刹，但是没能踩到。

sentence.Network_en: He lost a foot when he was struck by a train.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给火车撞伤，失去了一只脚。

sentence.Network_en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentence.Network_cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

list.abs: 图文3.LED灯珠是一个光源:它应当用亮度单位来表示,也就是英尺朗伯(Foot Lambert)fL或坎德拉(candela)cd/m2,也称为尼特(nits)。有些工程师更倾向于用fL,而国际.

means.word_mean: 1. a former luminance unit equal to one lumen per square foot
